mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(l_no, b_id, b_name, b_content) value (#{lNo}, #{bId}, #{bName}, #{bContent})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_board where l_no=#{lNo}

select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, b.bNo as bNo, b.lNo as lNo, b.bId as bId, b.bName as bName, b.bContent as bContent, DATE_FORMAT(b.b_reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as bRegDate from (select @rownum:=0 order by @rownum) tmp, (select b_no as bNo, l_no as lNo, b_id as bId, b_name as bName, b_content as bContent, b_reg_date from tbl_board where l_no = #{lNo}) b order by b.bNo desc limit #{pIndex}, 5
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board_comment(b_no, c_id, c_content) value (#{bNo}, #{cId}, #{cContent})
